::Vamprah::

Vamprah looked round worried when she felt the shake, but she tried
 to hold her fear and nswered at Devilduel.

"First I will modify the glasses in order to they block most of the 
sunlight... with it I'll see s if where dark. This glassed mini 
computer djust the light nd I will modify to do opposite..." She 
thought second the second question of DEvilduel" I guess that the 
fact that my beast mode affect my reaction to Sunlight it's made for 
my sharped nocturnal-vision or it was made with the purpose to limit 
my movements... I don't sure what's the nswered..."
